overview: This file controls what Item Types will appear as possible items to purchase in the Gambling UI  Item Types can be added to this list as a potential option for the Gambling system

data_fields.name: name
data_fields.description: This is a reference field to describe the Item

data_fields.name: code
data_fields.description: This is a pointer to “code” field from weapons.txt/armor.txt/misc.txt
